segments.text: This scene makes me so uneasy.

segments.text: The kitchen looks ordinary at first, with the window open to the yard.

segments.text: That puddle at her feet is dangerous; one wrong step and she'll slip.

segments.text: The children are risking even more, with the boy on that unstable stool.

segments.text: He's stretching to grab cookies, not seeing how close he is to falling.

segments.text: The girl watches eagerly, hand outstretched for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate how unaware everyone seems to the hazards building up.

segments.text: The tidy garden outside just makes the inside chaos feel worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby could shatter if there's a tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before it's a real tragedy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart races just watching this unfold.
